languages.text: Агитация, организованная слугами почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, не дала ожидаемого результата. Ни е{mf|го|е} обращение по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системам колонии, ни раздача провизии и {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекафа{/g} не вызвали благодарности у распущенных и погрязших в скотстве подданных Януса. Вместо того, чтобы с благодарностью принять подарки Лорд-капитана, они начали шептаться, будто их пытаются "купить лишним пайком".

traits.locale_text: Агитация, организованная слугами почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, не дала ожидаемого результата. Ни е{mf|го|е} обращение по вокс-системам колонии, ни раздача провизии и рекафа не вызвали благодарности у распущенных и погрязших в скотстве подданных Януса. Вместо того, чтобы с благодарностью принять подарки Лорд-капитана, они начали шептаться, будто их пытаются "купить лишним пайком".

languages.text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.
languages.original_text: Агитация, организованная слугами почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, не дала ожидаемого результата. Ни е{mf|го|е} обращение по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системам колонии, ни раздача провизии и {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекафа{/g} не вызвали благодарности у распущенных и погрязших в скотстве подданных Януса. Вместо того, чтобы с благодарностью принять подарки Лорд-капитана, они начали шептаться, будто их пытаются "купить лишним пайком".

traits.locale_text: The campaign organized by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's vox-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and recaff. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

The campaign organized by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's vox-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and recaff. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

The campaign organized by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's vox-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and recaff. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

languages.text: 尊敬を捧げられしロード・キャプテンの仲間が計画した軍事計画は思っていたほどの成果が上がらなかった。理性を失い堕落したヤヌスの民は、ロード・キャプテンがコロニー中に放送した{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}による演説にも、食料と{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}模造コーヒー{/g}の配給にも感謝を示さなかった。ロード・キャプテンからの心付けに感謝で応えるどころか、当局は表面的な配給で住民を買収しようとしているとしていると、不平を漏らし始めた。
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

traits.locale_text: 尊敬を捧げられしロード・キャプテンの仲間が計画した軍事計画は思っていたほどの成果が上がらなかった。理性を失い堕落したヤヌスの民は、ロード・キャプテンがコロニー中に放送した{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}による演説にも、食料と{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}模造コーヒー{/g}の配給にも感謝を示さなかった。ロード・キャプテンからの心付けに感謝で応えるどころか、当局は表面的な配給で住民を買収しようとしているとしていると、不平を漏らし始めた。

languages.text: 德高望重的舰长大人组织的这场行动，并没有取得预期的效果。舰长大人向整个殖民地播放{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}演说，还慷慨地分发了补给品与{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}雷卡咖啡{/g}，但那些放荡不羁、厚颜无耻的臣民完全没有任何感激之意。人们不仅没有心怀感激地接受舰长大人的礼物，反而开始嘀咕，认为当局打算用吃剩的口粮来收买他们。
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

traits.locale_text: 德高望重的舰长大人组织的这场行动，并没有取得预期的效果。舰长大人向整个殖民地播放{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}演说，还慷慨地分发了补给品与{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}雷卡咖啡{/g}，但那些放荡不羁、厚颜无耻的臣民完全没有任何感激之意。人们不仅没有心怀感激地接受舰长大人的礼物，反而开始嘀咕，认为当局打算用吃剩的口粮来收买他们。

languages.text: La campaña organizada por el personal {mf|del estimado Lord Capitán|de la estimada Lord Capitán} no obtuvo el resultado esperado. Los disolutos y embrutecidos súbditos de Janus no reaccionaron con gratitud al {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} que se transmitió por toda la colonia, ni tampoco al reparto de provisiones y {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}café{/g}. En vez de dar gracias por los obsequios {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán}, corrió el rumor de que las autoridades estaban tratando de comprarlos con raciones de excedentes alimentarios.
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

traits.locale_text: La campaña organizada por el personal {mf|del estimado Lord Capitán|de la estimada Lord Capitán} no obtuvo el resultado esperado. Los disolutos y embrutecidos súbditos de Janus no reaccionaron con gratitud al {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} que se transmitió por toda la colonia, ni tampoco al reparto de provisiones y {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}café{/g}. En vez de dar gracias por los obsequios {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán}, corrió el rumor de que las autoridades estaban tratando de comprarlos con raciones de excedentes alimentarios.

languages.text: Die von Leuten des geschätzten Lord Captain organisierte Kampagne hatte nicht die erwartete Wirkung. Die lasterhaften und unzivilisierten Untertanen von Janus reagierten nicht mit Dankbarkeit auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Ansprache des Lord Captain, die überall in der Kolonie übertragen wurde, oder auf die verteilten Nahrungsmittel und den {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}Rekaf{/g}. Statt die Geschenke des Lord Captain dankbar entgegenzunehmen, murrten sie, die Behörden würden nur versuchen, sie mit zusätzlichen Rationen zu kaufen.
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

traits.locale_text: Die von Leuten des geschätzten Lord Captain organisierte Kampagne hatte nicht die erwartete Wirkung. Die lasterhaften und unzivilisierten Untertanen von Janus reagierten nicht mit Dankbarkeit auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Ansprache des Lord Captain, die überall in der Kolonie bertragen wurde, oder auf die verteilten Nahrungsmittel und den {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}Rekaf{/g}. Statt die Geschenke des Lord Captain dankbar entgegenzunehmen, murrten sie, die Behörden würden nur versuchen, sie mit zusätzlichen Rationen zu kaufen.

languages.text: La campagne organisée par le personnel de l'honorable {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} n'eut pas les résultats escomptés. Le discours-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, diffusé dans toute la colonie, fut accueilli sans la moindre gratitude par les sujets rustres et débauchés de Janus, au même titre que la distribution de provisions et de {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g}. Plutôt que de présenter ses remerciements pour ces cadeaux, le peuple commença à se plaindre tout bas que les autorités cherchaient à les acheter avec des packs de rations supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

traits.locale_text: La campagne organisée par le personnel de l'honorable {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} n'eut pas les résultats escomptés. Le discours-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, diffusé dans toute la colonie, fut accueilli sans la moindre gratitude par les sujets rustres et débauchés de Janus, au même titre que la distribution de provisions et de {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g}. Plutôt que de présenter ses remerciements pour ces cadeaux, le peuple commença à se plaindre tout bas que les autorités cherchaient à les acheter avec des packs de rations supplémentaires.

languages.text: Muhterem Lord Kaptan'ın emrindekilerin düzenlediği kampanya, beklenen neticeye ulaşmadı. Janus'un hayâsız ve yabani vatandaşları, koloni genelinde yayınlanan Lord Kaptan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} hitabı ile gıda ve {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}kahfe{/g} dağıtımına olumsuz tepki gösterdi. Lord Kaptan'ın hediyelerini minnetle kabul etmek yerine halk, yetkililerin elinde kalan fazla kumanyalarla gözlerini boyamaya çalıştıklarını iddia etmeye başladı.
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people did not produce the expected result. The dissolute and brutish subjects of Janus did not respond with gratitude to the Lord Captain's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-address, which was broadcast throughout the colony, or to the distribution of provisions and {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}. Instead of accepting the Lord Captain's gifts with thanks, the people began to mutter that the authorities were trying to buy them off with surplus rations packs.

traits.locale_text: Muhterem Lord Kaptan'ın emrindekilerin düzenlediği kampanya, beklenen neticeye ulaşmadı. Janus'un hayâsız ve yabani vatandaşları, koloni genelinde yayınlanan Lord Kaptan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} konuşması ile gıda ve {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}kahfe{/g} dağıtımına olumsuz tepki gösterdi. Lord Kaptan'ın hediyelerini minnetle kabul etmek yerine halk, yetkililerin elinde kalan fazla kumanyalarla gözlerini boyamaya çalıştıklarını iddia etmeye başladı.
